description.value: Your taunts and threats earn your foes ire. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize} a creature, its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened} condition can't decrease to less than 1 at the end of its turn until it either uses a hostile action against you or can no longer observe or sense you for at least 1 round.
